Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11587:
Dwarvish Translation Guide

Allows you to speak and understand the Dwarven 
language.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11588:
Rusty Key

A big old rusty key that might be able to open
a creepy sewer door...
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11589:
Club Card

Gives you to access the Casino in the Oasis.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11590:
Special Charm

A magical trinket that permanently increases your
daily luck by a noticable amount.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11591:
Skull Key

Unlocks the door to the Skull Cavern Mines in the
Calico Desert.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.magnifyingglass:
Magnifying Glass

Gives you the ability to find 'Secret Notes'!
Entries.KeyToTheTown:
Key To The Town

Allows you to access all buildings in town 
at any time of the day.

Entries.DarkTalisman:
Dark Talisman

Used to open the passage at the northeast end 
of the Railroad.
Entries.MagicInk:
Magic Ink

An arcane item that allows you to purchase new farm 
buildings from a book on a stand in the Wizard's Tower.
Entries.BearPaw:
Bear's Knowledge

Increases the sell price of Blackberries and 
Salmonberries.
Entries.SpringOnionBugs:
Spring Onion Mastery

Increases the sell price of Spring Onions.

Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11587:
Dwarvish Translation Guide

Unlocks the ability to speak to the Dwarf in The
Mines and the Dwarf in the Volcano Dungeon allowing
you to access their shops.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11588:
Rusty Key

Unlocks the gate at the southern edge of 
Cindersap Forest allowing you to access 
The Sewers.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11589:
Club Card

Give to the bouncer to allow you to access the
Casino in the back of the Oasis in the Calico Desert.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11590:
Special Charm

A magical trinket that permanently increases 
your daily luck. Daily luck ranges from -0.07 
to 0.07. This trinket adds 0.025 to whatever 
your luck is that day.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11591:
Skull Key

Unlocks the door to the Skull Cavern Mines in the
Calico Desert and also unlocks the Junimo Kart 
game machine in The Stardrop Saloon.
Entries.SkillsPage.cs.magnifyingglass:
Magnifying Glass

Gives you the ability to find 'Secret Notes'! These 
can be found by tilling soil, chopping trees, mining,
fishing, or even killing monsters. These notes reveal
rare and useful information, and can be reviewed in
your collections tab.
Entries.KeyToTheTown:
Key To The Town

Allows you to access all buildings in town at any time 
of the day. The key does not function at homes outside 
of Pelican Town (eg. Leah's Cottage, Elliott's Cabin, 
the Movie Theater, and the Oasis in Calico Desert).

Entries.DarkTalisman:
Dark Talisman

Used to open the passage at the northeast end 
of the Railroad allowing you to access the 
Witch's Swamp, and the Witch's Hut beyond.
Entries.MagicInk:
Magic Ink

An arcane item that allows you to purchase 
new farm buildings from a book on a stand in 
the Wizard's Tower. 

The new farm buildings include: the obelisks, 
the Junimo Hut, and the Gold Clock.
Entries.BearPaw:
Bear's Knowledge

Blackberries and Salmonberries sold by you
are worth three times as much. Artisan Goods made
from those berries DO NOT increase in sale price.
Entries.SpringOnionBugs:
Spring Onion Mastery

Spring Onions sold by you are worth five times as 
much. Artisan Goods made from Spring Onions DO NOT 
increase in sale price.

Entries.SkillsPage.cs.11591:
Skull Key

A key with a skull on the top, is there somewhere
you've seen a door with a skull?

Entries.DarkTalismanDescription: 你找到了黑暗护身符!上面全是虫子的黏液...
Entries.MagicInkDescription: 你找到了巫师丢失的魔法墨水!最好把它还给他.
Entries.MagnifyingGlassDescription: 你收到放大镜了!你现在有能力找到“秘密笔记”。这些注释揭示了稀有和有用的信息，可以在您的集合选项卡中查看。
Entries.SpecialCharmDescription: 你收到了特殊的魅力!你会感到好运的光环围绕着你(运气会永久增加)!

Entries.SpecialItem.cs.13092: 你找到骷髅钥匙了!你不确定它是干什么用的，但它似乎很重要。它被加到你的钱包里了。
Entries.SpecialItem.cs.13090: 在一块木头下面，你发现了一张俱乐部卡!你不确定它是干什么用的，但它似乎很重要。它被加到你的钱包里了。
